summary: This document is a Certificate of Existence issued by Osbert E. Potter, the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands, certifying that Southern Financial, LLC is duly organized under the laws of the United States Virgin Islands. It confirms the company's filing status and that it has paid all applicable fees.

persons.name: Osbert E. Potter
persons.context: Osbert E. Potter is the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands who issued the Certificate of Existence for Southern Financial, LLC.

keyFacts: Southern Financial, LLC filed Articles of Organization on February 25, 2013.
The company is duly organized under the laws of the United States Virgin Islands.
The duration of the Limited Liability Company is unlimited.
The company has paid all applicable fees to date.
Articles of Termination have not been filed by the company.
